thread.section_title: Ibis Styles London Southwark Rose - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Girls weekend
thread.title_full: Girls weekend - Review of Ibis Styles London Southwark Rose, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Scarletgirl61
title: Girls weekend
text: Spent 2 nights here with 3 friends. Delighted with the Hotel from arrival until our departure. Quirky decor & furnishings, friendly staff and no formality - no reception desk! Tea & coffee available all day long & a delightful bar area for a night time tipple. Highly recommended & will be visiting again.
